nl.esciencecenter.esight.input

Class InputHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.input.InputHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jogamp.newt.event.KeyListener, com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseListener, com.jogamp.newt.event.NEWTEventListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ESightExampleInputHandler, TextEditorKeyboardHandler

    public class InputHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseListener, com.jogamp.newt.event.KeyListener
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen A singleton pattern generic Input event Handler for use in OpenGL applications. Currently handles only basic mouse events (left-click-drag, scrollwheel).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  InputHandler.octants
      Octants are used to define a direction from which the viewer is looking at the scene, these are useful in Octrees.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      VecF3 rotation
      Final rotation in openGL units
      float viewDist
      Final view distance (translation) in openGL units
